Package clock

Class Model

java.lang.Object
clock.Model
public class Model extends Object
The Model part of the MVC architecture. Concerns itself with PriorityQueue that stores alarms, and ICalFileHandler that handles file loading and saving.

  • Method Details

    • timeUpdated

      public boolean timeUpdated()
      Get whether the current time changed on the last call to update.
      Returns:
      True if the time changed on the last call to update.

    • addAlarm

      public void addAlarm(Calendar alarmTime, String message)
      Add a new Alarm with the alarmTime and message provided.
      Parameters:
      alarmTime - The expiry time for the Alarm.
      message - The message to display when the Alarm expires.

    • setActiveFile

      public void setActiveFile(File file)
      Sets the currently active File to the File provided.
      Parameters:
      file - The file to be set as the active file.

    • getActiveFile

      public File getActiveFile()
      Get the currently active File.
      Returns:
      The currently active File or null if no File has been set.

    • saveStateToActiveFile

      public boolean saveStateToActiveFile()
      Save to the currently active File.
      Returns:
      True if the operation succeeded.

    • loadStateFromActiveFile

      public boolean loadStateFromActiveFile()
      Loads the currently active File.
      Returns:
      True if the operation succeeded.

    • removeAlarm

      public void removeAlarm(int index) throws ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException, QueueUnderflowException
      Remove the Alarm at the index provided from the queue.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the Alarm to remove.
      Throws:
      ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
      QueueUnderflowException

      Deactivate the activated Alarm.

    • getAlarmHour

      public int getAlarmHour()
      Get the hour of the next Alarm to expire.
      Returns:
      The hour of the next alarm to expire. If the queue is empty returns -1.

    • getQueue

      public PriorityQueue getQueue()
      Get the PriorityQueue of Alarms.
      Returns:
      The PriorityQueue containing all the Alarms.

    • getQueueUpdated

      public boolean getQueueUpdated()
      Get whether the queue has been updated since the flag was last reset. You should reset the flag after performing any required UI updates.
      Returns:
      A flag representing whether the queue has been updated.

    • resetQueueUpdatedFlag

      public void resetQueueUpdatedFlag()
      Reset the queue updated flag to false.

    • isQueueEmpty

      public boolean isQueueEmpty()
      Get whether or not the queue is empty.
      Returns:
      True if the queue is empty.

    • getAlarm

      public Alarm getAlarm(int index) throws ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
      Get the alarm stored at the provided index within the queue.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the alarm required.
      Returns:
      The alarm stored at the index within the queue.
      Throws:
      ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException

    • getAlarmCount

      public int getAlarmCount()

      Resets the internal queue.
